parameters.name: FromTimeInSeconds
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. This value is a timestamp. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: Keyword
parameters.description: The search keyword. Fuzzy match is supported.

parameters.name: NodeId
parameters.description: The ID of the node on which the pipeline job is executed. You can call [ListPipelineRuns](~~438042~~) to obtain the node ID.

parameters.name: Offset
parameters.description: The offset from which the data is returned. Default value: 0.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of logs returned per page.

parameters.name: PipelineRunId
parameters.description: The ID of the pipeline job. You can call [ListPipelineRuns](~~438042~~) to obtain the ID of the pipeline job.

parameters.name: Reverse
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the logs are sorted in descending order. Valid values:

*   false: The logs are sorted in ascending order. This is the default value.
*   true: The logs are sorted in descending order.

parameters.name: ToTimeInSeconds
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. This value is a timestamp. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: TokenId
parameters.description: The ID of the shared pipeline job.
